snippet: “Missoula” offers a searing view into campus sexual assaults, some by football players from the University of Montana’s beloved Grizzlies, and how victims were treated by the local justice system.
abstract: Missoula, Mont, residents are anxious over release of book Missoula: Rape and the Justice System in a College Town by written by Jon Krakauer; focus of book is on campus sexual assaults, some by University of Montana football players, and how victims were treated by local justice system; many in Missoula wonder whether scrutiny will bring necessary discussion or will simply hurt their town’s image.

byline.contributor: Alexandra Alter contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: “Missoula” offers a searing view into campus sexual assaults, some by football players from the University of Montana’s beloved Grizzlies, and how victims were treated by the local justice system.

headline.main: Anxiety in Missoula Over Book About Campus Assaults

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Missoula: Rape and the Justice System in a College Town (Book)
